ComicInfo.Series: George R.R. Martin's A Clash of Kings
ComicInfo.Summary:
Arya, with the help of Yoren, a brother of the Night’s Watch, has escaped from King’s Landing, but the road to the Wall brings its own dangers. Meanwhile, Sansa attends a tournament on the sadistic King Joffrey’s name-day, and Bran, in Winterfell, suffers from strange dreams of wolves…
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Regular Cover | Mike Miller | 1 | B/Sub | Subscription Cover | Mel Rubi | 2 | C/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Mike Miller | 3 | D/RI | 1:15 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Mel Rubi | 4 | E/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Mel Rubi | 5 |
